name: Chain Break (NnYGames)
description: You are an alien in a prison on a spaceship. Suddenly, the spaceship is getting attacked by another enemy ship. The prison spaceship will activate its sheilds in a short time in order to stop the bullet fire, which will take power from the door enabling you to eascape. You must avoid bullets until the given time runs out and then you can escape your cell. You might also be attached to a chain, so you need to destroy the chain using the bullets that are being fired at you before the timer runs out. Art done by MikaDigitalFira🔥 and music and sfx done by Lucas Pavao.
